#| warning: false
data = data |>
  mutate(Section = ifelse(
    grepl("^\\d+\\.?\\d*$", Section),               # Checks if purely numeric (integer or decimal)
,    # Round and convert back to character
Section                                         # Keep original for non-numeric entries
))
